_header: God that shaped both sea and sand
Note: A late variant of 1605; for a later variant, c. 1605, cf. London, British Library Harley 542, ff. 31a-33v.
_description: The House of Stanley: Bosworth Field — 656 lines in quatrains

BLAdd27879.First Lines:
God that shope both sea and land& ffor all creatures
                    dyed…
BLAdd27879.Editions:
Hales,  John Wesley,  and  Frederick James Furnivall, eds.  
             Bishop Percy’s Folio Manuscript: Ballads and Romances.
         3 vols. London: Trübner, 1867-68: 235-59.
